What is Prisma AIRS MCP?

Prisma AIRS MCP is a Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that seamlessly integrates Palo Alto Networks' Prisma AIRS (AI Runtime Security) with AI applications like Claude. It provides real-time security scanning, threat detection, and compliance enforcement for AI-generated content.

Key Capabilities

  • üõ°Ô∏è Real-time Threat Detection: Scan prompts and responses for security threats
  • üîç Comprehensive Analysis: Detect prompt injections, malicious code, data leaks, and more
  • ‚ö° High Performance: Sub-second scanning with intelligent caching
  • üîß Easy Integration: Standard MCP protocol with TypeScript SDK
  • üìä Enterprise Features: Monitoring, scaling, and compliance tools
  • üê≥ Container Ready: Docker and Kubernetes deployment options

  • Enhanced deployment automation
